div.p: Call or text to anonymously report:

p.strong:
Galway Junior/Senior High School:
518-749-3042
Joseph Henry Elementary School:
518-749-3041

br.br: Always call 911 to report an immediate threat or danger to our students, staff, or school.

a.title: Rachel Wnuk Named to Sports Women of the Year

div.a: Rachel Wnuk Named to Sports Women of the Year
div.div: Rachel was named as one of the 10 scholastic award recipients for 2020 by the Capital District Sports Women of the Year.

a.title: Julia Reedy Receives Highest Honorable Mention

div.a: Julia Reedy Receives Highest Honorable Mention
div.div: Julia was named by PrepVolleyball in their 2019 "Soph 79" list of most impactful high school sophomores.
Due to serious public health concerns, Governor Cuomo enacted legislation on June 13, 2019, which eliminated the religious exemption from immunizations. Click to read more.
One of our students, as part of her Girl Scout Gold Award project, has started a brand new FREE Backpack Program for Galway CSD students in grades K-12.
